reviews.text: Any NGO is there?? One of my friend's uncle who have been lost since 2012 is found on an NGO." St Holy cross " has writeen over the tshirt of that NGO. So i just want to confirm is there any link between that ngo or this church??. If any one knows something about that church or  ngo plz contact me.
A nice small church surrounded with houses
Parish for T.Nagar residents.

Hello All, I am visitor from Kolkata and will be in Chennai on Sunday 25th March,2018 which is Palm Sunday, I would be staying in Cenotaph Road, in-front of Moopnar Flyover, Can some one please let me know as to which Catholic Church is near to this place and I can attend the Service in the Evening please
Good place for worship

Very prominent Hanuman Temple in Delhi. You get positive vibes and inner peace in and around the temple complex. I have given 4 rating just for the reason that area around temple could be managed better as you can find 100's of beggers, eunuch, kids asking and following you for something. The eating joints are creating mess by not keeping cleanliness. Need discipline, hygiene and remove beggars from the place.

Very old Hanuman Mandir in Delhi. Crowded on Tuesday. Parking is easily available in morning before 9 am. After that parking may be a struggle. Lot of shops outside the temple for offerings inside. Beautiful temple.

A weekly ritual for years. The Lord helps me understand everything. He gives me the power to overpower all problems coming my way. I have realized this week after week. Day after day. It just happened few years back that we started going there every Saturday.  Else this place was within 2 kilometers of my work place for 12 years
I am short of words to describe this place. All i can say is whatever i wish for, i got that. This place is full of spiritual energy. I feel very relaxed whenever i come here.

This is one of the peaceful temple i also like and visiting from last 20 years still the emotions are same as it was at that time. It keeps on developing, today also people'feeling are attached to it who are coming from years. It have a great value

I always go there for their chocolate pastries..... best they have is choco fantasy.... enjoy it hot with scoop of vanilla ice-cream..... must try when you visit there.... other things are also good there.... like their sandwiches and coffes and other cold beverages........
I love this place... Visiting this since 2012... Yes.. best things do happen over a cup of coffee...  Lots of memories for lifetime...
A nice place if you want to spend time leisurely. ( without spending too much) Ps: We ordered only a tea and coffee so no comments about the food. Service was fine.

Awesome beverage as well as food of CCD. 
Well coordinated staff ...................
Nice place to enjoy coffee. Good Environment

They doing baby ear piercing here. The staff that work at the jewellery store are really friendly. They ways gave two staff to pierce baby ears as they do both at the same time to prevent added stress to the child which is perfect

Ignite Records is the best record store in the city. A real vinyl cavern that is packed with fairly priced records to suit a wide range of tastes. Rich (the owner) is a real gent, very knowledgeable and accommodating. The store is friendly and welcoming. Important we keep this indie going!
Legendary Birmingham fixture! Great place to get alternative/rock clothing and accessories  in an iconic location in the centre of town for nearly 50 years.

I have been going to Oasis for over 10 years now and every time you go in it is exciting, literally like a kid in a sweet shop. There is always something new and exciting going on. Highly recommend it!

Oasis has lost it appeal and is no longer a fashion markets. It's now full of rude and over priced tattoo parlours and pretentious "clothing shops". Not to mention the shops selling drug paraphernalia. 

Both inside and out the markets are rundown and are stuck in the 1980s and is in need of updating and bring in to this millennium. 
The markets also attracts the wrong kind of people and is a center of anti-social behaviour. I have often seen the police and security patrolling and moving people on. 

The Oasis markets are full of empty stalls and shops, which adds to the rundown feeling.

In conclusion, I would not recommend visting the markets for this reason.
Decent rooms for couple of nights stay. Bit old in structure, the stars indicate the value for the price you pay, nice service.
Having dine in walking distance from my residence, is superb that too although there are many hotels and motels, resturants nereby , but this used to be fantastic whenever i used to eat in my way.
Rajhans hotel and regency is very very naic. Fesilitis sach as free wi-fi free paeking and brekfast.costumer sarvish is good.
Very good. Unlimited thali. Awesome food & taste.

If you want to eat Authentic Indian food and that too in UNLIMITED quantity, then that's the only place in Bhopal for you. This place has only Thali system that too at a very effective price of Rs. 180 and Rs 120(excluding tax) . If you go there, then don't forget to eat at least 8 gulab jamuns, as it is the best sweet provided by them. 😅

What to say about this holy place. Really words are less. Beautifully built, well maintained and sacred place. Since the temple is made out of stones, the inside temperature is always less than the outside. You will be stunned to see the glow on the face of the Shree Mahalaxmi idol.

One of the nicest construction I have seen for a temple. Proper line management and staff members are very polite. People were helping for the first timer like me to guide and give me the tour of temple
Temple being a temple, Shree Ambabai Temple Kolhapur brings peace of mind and solace. Everything is well managed, people help all the devotees. The way to the main temple is properly chalked out.
This is Hindu place of worship of Goddess Ambabai (Devi) in Kolhapur. A place of special Importance in my life. Well managed. Believed by many.

Hindu Temple.
Very very good place visit.
relaxed atmosphere.
It's a great place to take small children.
And many more…
Wonderfull historical Masjid and monument, wide area for prayers. Visitors also get pleasure. Its very calm and cool place to visit.

It is also one of the oldest building in the vicinity. The one pic shows is what they say original gold painted wall..its a mosque basically. But if u r in do visit it. If possible hire a guide with u. A nice story attached with all these monuments will be explained. Free entrance as well as free parking
Well maintained...ask the courtier abt the monument he'll detail it to u without charging for it...

One of best pilgrimage to vist in vijaypur
I love to visit it again and again
Beautifullll place to visit here! MashaAllah beautifullll masjid!

The food is quite authentic. Ambience is good enough. The staff are courteous and prompt. We stopped by for lunch. Though they had a buffet, we opted for a-la-carte. Our order was served quite late; had to wait almost over 45 minutes. But the staff were apologetic and gave us 2 complimentary dishes. Have to say though the wait was worth it, the mutton was cooked to perfection, the melt-in-mouth kind. The fish was also nicely done; a little heads up about the sweet taste of the gravy would be appreciated. Not everyone is familiar with bong cuisine. All in all it was a good experience.

Are you craving for some authentic Bengali food in a foreign land? Visit Oh! Calcutta. Amazon service, food quality at its best. Perfectly balanced ingredients, not much oily or spicy. If you go in a group, you will surely have a great time there. Ambience is also commendable.

One of the greatest place in Bengaluru to enjoy Bengali cuisine. Location wise perfect and valet parking make life easier when visiting this place.
Price wise on the higher side.

One of the few good bengali restaurants of Bangalore. It is a little pricey, but the food is delicious! They have lunch buffets, but I opted against it. Tried the mustard fish(sorse) which was amazing
Very tasty traditional Bengali food. Mouthwatering recipes. Calcutta Biriyani is awesome. Staffs are well dressed and well behaved, helpful. The ambience is very nice. Had a great experience.

If you're in Thailand and looking for Sunday worship. This is a great English speaking Anglican Church. Services are Sunday morning 7am and 10:00 am English worship. 1:00 pm. Thai whorship service. They have Sunday school for the kids. Potluck lunches after the service to meet and greet.
Nice playgroup on Wednesdays and Fridays. The pastor is very kind and we enjoyed the Sunday service on Easter.
Really moving experience-great interaction with sooo many cultures.
The Christmas morning service was lively and awesome.  There are washrooms (even for the disabled).
A true reflection of God's people a place of worship with dignity I love this church for all people come and be blessed

Don't order from here as if you fall asleep you don't get your order or your money back so please don't order from little Italy pizza really bad review go to pizza hut as its a lot better than this place

I moved out of Aberdeen a year ago and what a loss it is not to have Little Italy around.. I simply cannot find a pizza restaurant with the same quality pizzas as this.

Expand! And for every newcomers, I highly recommend the Little Italy Calzone 12" if you like a bit spicy food!
Their sizes are a bit on the small side but otherwise great value for your money.

I went and ordered food throigh their website. The order was rejected due to them being too busy which I totally understand. However they proceeded to charge me twice and took the money out of my account. I emailed them and have not received any response. I am really not happy with this and this is slmesomet that people need to be avare off

The pizza is very good. I would say 7/10. I have tried the piri piri one and calzone. The number of ingredients in calzone is perfect. No option to order garlic sauce. Only garlic mayo available which taste very average. It is so easy to make garlic sauce, it should be a problem for the pizza place. The delivery time was shocking, 1:35, during the week. I cannot imagine waiting time during the peak times. Furthermore, the place is quite dear. It is not real Italian pizza therefore price should be lower. Why do I need to pay extra fee while ordering online through your website. I see the potential but some changes must be done.
